{# Displays the logo of your documentation site, in the header navbar. #} {#- Logo HTML and image #} {# get all the brand information from html_theme_option #} {# Theme switching is only available when JavaScript is enabled. # Thus we should add the extra image using JavaScript, defaulting # depending on the value of default_mode; and light if unset. #} {% set alt = "%s - Home" % docstitle %} {% if default_mode is undefined or default_mode == "auto" %} {% set default_mode = "light" %} {% endif %} {% set js_mode = "light" if default_mode == "dark" else "dark" %}
